To check if a Property object can be built on with houses and hotels.

CanOwn - Class in squares
This is the CanOwn class.
CanOwn(String, int, Square.SquareType) - Constructor for class squares.CanOwn

Card - Class in cards
The Card class defines the structure of all Card types of which there are a number extended from this abstract class.
Card(String, String, int) - Constructor for class cards.Card
Class Constructor which takes as argument the Card type, the Card description and the Card value and sets the class variables to these values
cardDesc - Variable in class cards.Card
 
cards - package cards
 
cardType - Variable in class cards.Card
 
cardValue - Variable in class cards.Card
 
Chance - Class in cards
The Chance class extends the Card class as its parent.
Chance(String, String, int) - Constructor for class cards.Chance
This is the Constructor which has the same arguments of its parent class of type, description and value
chances - Static variable in class game.Board
 
checkBankruptcyTradeValue(Player) - Static method in class operations.Checks
This is used in the bankruptcy operation when a Player object is trying to obtain more money to pay off debts.
checkHouseHotelValue(Player) - Static method in class operations.Checks
This method checks all of the combined value of hotels and houses and is particularly useful at the end of the game when we are checking who won the game because of asset value
checkIfValidGame() - Static method in class operations.Checks
Method to check if a game can still continue
checkMortgagingValue(Player) - Static method in class operations.Checks
Check the value of mortgaging CanOwn objects in the Player object's title deed list.
checkPlayerCanOwnStatus(Player) - Static method in class operations.Checks
Prints out the status of a Player object's CanOwn list or Title Deed list.
checkPlayerStatus(Player) - Static method in class operations.Checks
Current status of a player which is printed to the screen.
Checks - Class in operations
This is the Checks class.
Checks() - Constructor for class operations.Checks
 
checkSquare(int, Player, BufferedReader) - Static method in class operations.Checks
This is used to check the square that a player object lands on and handles whether you can buy it, if they are the owner already or needing to pay rent.
checkWinner() - Static method in class operations.Checks
This method determines the winner of the game when 2 players in the game have gone bankrupt.
clearBankruptcyTradeStatus() - Method in class game.Player
Clears all of the preliminary trades made for the bankruptcy trades
clearBoard() - Static method in class game.Board
Clears the board.
CommunityChest - Class in cards
This Class describes the interaction of a Community Chest card which is very similar to the Chance Card functionality
CommunityChest(String, String, int) - Constructor for class cards.CommunityChest
This is the Constructor which has the same arguments of its parent class of type, description and value
communityChests - Static variable in class game.Board
 
completeBankruptcyTrade(BufferedReader) - Method in class game.Player
Complete the trade of a CanOwn object's TitleDeed card when in bankruptcy in order to raise money
createListPlayers(BufferedReader) - Static method in class operations.InputOutput
This creates the list of players who will take part in a game.
